job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a software consultant who has gotten really good at using generative AI tools over the past couple of years? Are you tired of being a PowerPoint monkey? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming, * Ensure 100% of clients achieve 100% of their business goals through AI-driven professional services engagements
job_details.full_text:
Implementation Engineer, Jigsaw (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a software consultant who has gotten really good at using generative AI tools over the past couple of years? Are you tired of being a PowerPoint monkey? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming, * Ensure 100% of clients achieve 100% of their business goals through AI-driven professional services engagements

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the application and utilization of generative AI tools to enhance existing consulting workflows and client service delivery. It explicitly states 'Coding or programming' is NOT a requirement and emphasizes using AI to 'automate the mundane' and 'freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.' While generative AI is mentioned, the role does not involve developing, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models themselves, nor does it require deep technical expertise in ML/GenAI engineering tasks like algorithm development, data engineering for model training, or MLOps. The core function appears to be leveraging AI as a tool within a consulting framework, aligning with the definition of the 'Ambiguous' profile for roles primarily focused on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity rather than AI development.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, and aligning technology solutions with client business goals, which falls under understanding the business context and translating needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements

job_tasks.justification: The role involves advising clients on best practices for panel creation and survey structure, demonstrating an understanding of client needs and strategic alignment.
job_tasks.phrase: advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation

job_tasks.justification: The job emphasizes ensuring solutions are aligned with client expectations and business goals, highlighting the strategic aspect of the role.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations

job_tasks.justification: The role requires aligning technology with client business goals, which is a core aspect of understanding the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: aligning technology with client business goals

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables. This implies the application of generative models, even if not their development.
job_tasks.phrase: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'building systems' as a focus, which, while not explicitly coding, suggests involvement in the construction or configuration of systems that deliver client services.
The role involves configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within a software platform, which is a form of system configuration and setup.
job_tasks.phrase: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on AI-enhanced project delivery and ensuring clients achieve business goals through AI-driven services, implying a focus on the operationalization and delivery of AI-powered solutions.
